As an AI language model I do not have personal preferences or emotions, but there are many great wineries to choose from in the Charlottesville area! Here are a few that are particularly popular:

1. King Family Vineyards: This family-owned vineyard is located in Crozet and offers award-winning wines and stunning views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. They also have picnic areas and a large lawn for lounging and playing games. 2. Veritas Vineyard & Winery: This vineyard is located in Afton and offers a variety of wines, as well as a farm-to-table cafe that serves delicious food. They have a spacious patio with outdoor seating that overlooks the vineyard. 3. Blenheim Vineyards: This vineyard is located just a few miles south of Charlottesville and is owned by musician Dave Matthews. They offer a variety of wines and have a beautiful tasting room that overlooks the vineyard. 4. Jefferson Vineyards: Located on the same site as the historic Monticello estate, Jefferson Vineyards offers a unique experience with tastings of wines made from grapes grown on Thomas Jefferson's estate. They also have a picnic area and offer tours of the vineyard. These are just a few great wineries in the Charlottesville area, but there are many more to choose from!
